mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( CART_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, GOODS_NUMBER, CART_REG_DATE, CART_AMOUNT) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{MEMBER_ID}, #{GOODS_NUMBER}, SYSDATE, #{CART_AMOUNT})
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM,X.* FROM( SELECT A.CART_NUMBER, A.GOODS_NUMBER, A.MEMBER_ID, A.CART_REG_DATE, A.CART_AMOUNT, D.GOODS_AMOUNT, D.GOODS_SIZE, D.GOODS_COLOR, D.GOODS_NAME, D.GOODS_PRICE, D.GOODS_THUMBNAIL,D.GOODS_CATEGORY1, D.GOODS_CATEGORY2 FROM CART A, GOODS D WHERE A.MEMBER_ID=#{MEMBER_ID} AND A.GOODS_NUMBER=D.GOODS_NUMBER ORDER BY A.CART_REG_DATE ASC)X
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET CART_AMOUNT=#{CART_AMOUNT}, CART_REG_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE CART_NUMBER=#{CART_NUMBER}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{MEMBER_ID} AND CART_NUMBER=#{CART_NUMBER}
